metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16336 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Exiv2::Internal::PngChunk::parseTXTChunk in Exiv2 v0.26 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read) via acrafted image file, a different vulnerability than CVE-2018-10999.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16336` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

exiv2 - 0.25-2.1ubuntu16.04.3
libexiv2-14 - 0.25-2.1ubuntu16.04.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: exiv2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.25-2.1ubuntu16.04.3').
